item.title: Blazing fast CSS3 transitions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Learn how to replace jQuery animations with blazing fast CSS3 transitions. All you need to know about hardware acceleration, browser support and profiling. Learn the techniques to have smooth transitions across mobile and web! If you’ve never animated on the web before, then this talk will put you on the right track. If you’ve already […]
item.content:encoded: Learn how to replace jQuery animations with blazing fast CSS3 transitions. All you need to know about hardware acceleration, browser support and profiling. Learn the techniques to have smooth transitions across mobile and web! If you’ve never animated on the web before, then this talk will put you on the right track. If you’ve already animated using CSS3, you’ll definitely want to attend to master your animation skills.
